title: 【MSE】Reality or Chaos 现实与混乱
author: PETER·篠
txt_content:
本帖最后由 PETER·篠 于 2015-5-8 20:48 编辑 

Reality or Chaos?现实与混乱

[board]地图介绍[board]
大家好！我回来了，并带来了一个特殊的地图。Mikado，Zeckou，Spacecooki和我把它构造出来并发到MineservExposition参加比赛！这张地图已全部完成，仅用了2天多一点点的时间！此地图总共使用了15万个方块！建立在300x300的土地上。不要忘了钻石，收藏夹和订阅！ <3 相关背景（英文）:
[Day 366] I understood. I'm different. I don't have my place in this city where the order is the most important. I'm here for one year. I hate this town for one year.[Day 371] : They sneaking around me, all the time.
[Day 378] : These sewers where I live, as dirty as they are, are better than this city. City where all is clear.
[Day 383] : I write, I think, I live in these sewers. Outside all the people follow the Programme.
[Day 387] : Their eyes shines in the dark.
[Day 392] : Their whole life is dictated. Their whole life is written in the Programme.
[Day 394] : More I try to ingnore them, more I fell their presence.
[Day 397] : But not mine. I'm the author of this abomination. All these lines, I wrote them.
[Day 401] : In the shadows they are. I have to go.
[Day 402] : I have to go, the memory has come back. The imagination create. I write.
[Day ---] : I understood. A world can't be perfect and ordered. Only the imagination can see the world like this.  The Reality  is coming. His adherents surround me. She is near, she inhales all. The Reality or the Chaos. It doesn't matter. Free, I am. Free to live, free to be different。

——原作者(Nati797_)

[painting]截图[painting]




















[powered_minecart]地图存档安装方法[powered_minecart]
Save存档(正版用户):关闭Minecraft，在Windows开始菜单中的搜索框中输入%appdata%/.minecraft，然后按下Enter（回车）键。把从百度网盘下载回来的地图存档解压缩放到.minecraft\saves文件夹里面。
Schematics存档：这类型需要MCEdit。下载完成后解压到桌面，关闭Minecraft，双击mcedit.exe，点下方import按钮，打开你下载的文件到你需要放的地方，最后点import，按Ctrl+s保存，Ctrl+w关掉存档，点Quit退出。

[book]地图资讯[book]作者：Nati797_
官网：Reality or Chaos?
标签：混乱，结构，怪兽，城镇
完成度：100%
下载地址：Reality or Chaos?

[compass]其它[compass]如果你喜欢这个地图，记得去官网给予其钻石、回复或订阅；
另外強烈建议海外玩家前往官网下载地址下载本地图，这也是对作者的一种支持。
若发现下载地址异常、存档损坏等问题，麻烦在下方留言告知。
如果你要载入这地图到服务器或拍视频，请记得填上作者名字及官网，感激不尽。
更多精彩内容敬请留意我的海外作品总索引貼。
